column1: Table 2. Myanmar: Summary Operations of the Nonfinancial Public Sector, 2015/16–2020/21
Act.            Est.                 Proj.               Proj.           Proj.              Proj.
On income, profits, and capital gains                   1,772            1,888               1,938                2,198          1,921              2,180
Sources: Data provided by the Myanmar authorities; and IMF staff estimates and projections.
1/ Revised to reflect Government Finance Statistics Manual 2014 classification. From 2018/19 onwards the fiscal year was changed to an October 1 to September 30
format. This table uses the new fiscal year definition for both historical data and projections.
2/ Includes proceeds from SEEs' commercial activities.
